title: Who is the best divorce attorney in Louisiana? - Quora

response.answer_text: Cindy DeLuca and its not even close. I previously had Lowe Stein as well as Winsberg and Arnold as my attorneys and it wasn't until I hired Cindy that things started to change, and considerably. See came highly recommended by 2 judges I know and put it this way, after our first court date my ex fired her attorney because we kicked their ass so bad. If you are going through a messy divorce trust me there is no one better. She doesn't advertise online so you won't find much on her, ask people in the family law field and they will all know who she is, her reputation is amazing. You will thank me later.

Divorce is an unwanted and critical situation for both the partners and it creates a messy and frustrating circumstances in both the partner's life. Though, nowadays, you can find many expert and experienced divorce attorney that provide the service in different types of family issues. While surfing on the internet, I found an excellent website, http://barrancolaw.com/ that provides the service in complex marital and family law as well as issues like, divorce in Florida.
